About

Once again, I’m a student. This time at Harvard Business School, last time studying biomedical engineering at Johns Hopkins University. I’m interested in data science, investing, design, books, and really just about everything else.

I made this site using Jekyll and Poole to occasionally record my ideas, rants, and observations. It, ideally, will also force me to follow through with various side projects.

If you want to contact me, my email is [firstname].[lastname] at gmail.
